mapper.update: update trading set total_num = #{totalNum}, time_avg = #{timeAvg}, time_max = #{tiemMax}, time_min = #{timeMin}, success = #{success}, fail = #{fail} where 1=1 and tx_code = #{txCode} and now_time = #{nowTime} and service_name = #{serviceName} and source_type = #{sourceType} ;
mapper.select: select tx_code as txCode,now_time as nowTime,total_num as totalNum, time_avg as timeAvg, time_max as timeMax, time_min as timeMin,success,fail,service_name as serviceName,source_type as sourceType from trading where tx_code = #{txCode} and now_time = #{nowTime} and service_name = #{serviceName} and source_type = #{sourceType};

select b.tx_name as txName,b.tx_type as txType,a.tx_code as txCode,SUM(a.total_num) as totalNum, SUM(a.total_num*a.time_avg)/SUM(a.total_num) as timeAvg,SUM(a.success) as success, SUM(a.fail) as fail,service_name as serviceName,source_type as sourceType from trading a join tx_code_info b on a.tx_code = b.tx_code where 1=1 and now_time between #{tradingStartDate} and #{tradingEndDate} GROUP BY a.tx_code
order by totalNum DESC
order by timeAvg DESC
order by success DESC
order by fail DESC

select b.tx_name as txName,a.tx_code as txCode,SUM(a.total_num) as totalNum, SUM(a.fail) as fail,SUM(a.fail)/SUM(a.total_num) as failRate from trading a join tx_code_info b on a.tx_code = b.tx_code where 1=1 and now_time between #{tradingStartDate} and #{tradingEndDate} GROUP BY a.tx_code order by failRate DESC

select b.tx_name as txName,a.tx_code as txCode,SUM(a.total_num) as totalNum, AVG(a.time_avg) as timeAvg,SUM(a.success) as success, SUM(a.fail) as fail from trading a join tx_code_info b on a.tx_code = b.tx_code where 1=1 and b.tx_type=1 and now_time between #{tradingStartDate} and #{tradingEndDate} GROUP BY a.tx_code order by totalNum DESC
